abstract.t: This draft describes a simple, incremental, network-based protocol toimplement separation of Internet addresses into Endpoint Identifiers(EIDs) and Routing Locators (RLOCs). This mechanism requires nochanges to host stacks and no major changes to existing databaseinfrastructures. The proposed protocol can be implemented in arelatively small number of routers.This proposal was stimulated by the problem statement effort at theAmsterdam IAB Routing and Addressing Workshop (RAWS), which tookplace in October 2006.
